meanings.definition: To laugh louder or more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outlaughs her friends during movie nights.
meanings.sent2: He outlaughs everyone in the room with his contagious laughter.
meanings.sent3: The comedian outlaughs the audience with his hilarious jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter outlaughs the sound of the thunderstorm outside.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's giggle outlaughs the chirping birds in the park.

meanings.definition: To be more amusing or entertaining than someone else.
meanings.sent1: The clown outlaughs all the other performers at the circus.
meanings.sent2: The movie outlaughs the audience with its clever humor.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy outlaughs the grumpy old dog with its antics.
meanings.sent4: Her witty comeback outlaughs his attempt at a joke.
meanings.sent5: The children's game outlaughs the boring board game they played yesterday.
